intro: Ruschia nieuwerustensis, commonly known as the Nieuwerust's Ruschia, is a flowering plant native to South Africa. It belongs to the Aizoaceae family, commonly referred to as the ice plant family. This succulent plant is characterized by its fleshy, cylindrical stems and small, star-shaped flowers that bloom in shades of pink and white. It thrives in well-drained soil and full sunlight, making it suitable for rock gardens and xeriscaping. Due to its ornamental value and adaptability, it is often cultivated in arid and semi-arid regions.
